en.title: TESTIMONIALS - QUANTUM PENDANT
en.content:
Scott Smith, Current World Longdrive Record Holder 539 yards
 
                 
 Scott A. Smith
Cincinnati, Ohio
6' 3" 235 lbs lbs 

Statistics:

164 mph 
Highest swing speed recorded

222 mph 
Highest ball speed recorded

539 yards 
Longest competitive drive

Longdrive Accomplishments:

· 2002 Pinnacle Distance Challenge beating John Daly by 36 yards for $100,000
· 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006 World Finalist
· Finished 5th 2005 World Longdrive Championship
· Finished 14th 2004 World Longdrive Championship
· 2005 District Champion
· Current World Record holder of 539 yards in LDA competition (Albuquerque, NM 2005)
· Sponsored and trained by Parrillo Performance athlete training 

Training five days a week, and hitting a thousand balls a week can be hard on the body. After wearing the Quantum Pendant for just a few days, I noticed less pain and fatigue. I have also noticed my swing speed jumped up a few mph on a consistant basis. I have had various pains in my shoulders and elbows since competing on the longdrive tour. Since wearing the Quantum Pendant, I have very little problems with any pain. I would recommend the Quantum Pendant for anyone from all walks of life.
  Lance Reader, 2004 World Long Drive Record Holder
Lance Reader, Krank Golf Founder
Phoenix, AZ
6' 2" 190 lbs

Statistics:

158 mph
Highest swing speed recorded 

218 mph
Highest ball speed recorded

526, 521, 518, 516 yards 
Longest competitive drive


Longdrive Accomplishments: - 2004 World Record Drive – 526 yards
- 2004 LDA District Qualifier 1st Place
- 2003 LDA Long Drive Tour Member
- 2003 Buick Open Long Drive Champion
- 2003 LDA District Qualifier 1st Place
- Krank Golf - Founder and President

I currently compete as a Professional Long Drive Golfer and own Krank Golf. We manufacture custom made driver for golf and long drive. After years of competing in long drive I developed a very sore right elbow tendon. Nothing seemed to get rid of the pain and discomfort. It became almost impossible to compete or even pick up my kids to give them a hug. After trying everything I could get my hands on and nothing relieving my pain, I decided to try the Quantum Pendant. Amazing! 

Not only was my pain significantly reduced, but also my range of motion was increased. I also noticed as I wore the pendant in competition, my concentration was far more focused and clear. I was more calm and controlled. I ended up winning the long drive event, hitting 427 yards. It always feels good to beat all the young guns in long drive. 

You see, I'm 44 years old; three years ago I broke the World Long Drive record, hitting 526 yards.Since then, I feel I have slipped a little in distance and accuracy.I believe it is mainly due to nagging injuries and lack of concentration.As far as I can tell the Quantum Pendant has resolved both those issues. I am grateful. 

Just as a note, every Long Driver on our team has tested ball speed and accuracy with and without the Quantum Pendant on. Every single hitter showed improved numbers with it on. Our testing was done carefully and most of the time without the hitter knowing why they were putting the pendant on. It really was very interesting.

Check out Krank Golf: http://www.krankgolf.com/team.htm
  Shalin Zulkifli, World Bowling Champion
 
 
- Credentials include Malaysian National Bowling 
  Team Member for the past 14 years
- 5 times Malaysian National Sportswoman Award Winner
- International Bowling Hall of Fame inductee
- World Bowling Champion
- 5 times National Champion
- Ranked 4th in the World in 2007. 

As a full time national athlete and businesswoman, I live a very fast paced and hectic lifestyle. As an athlete, I train daily and I bowl an average of 20 tournaments overseas a year. When I’m not training or competing overseas, I run my Bowling Centre “Pin Junction” with my fiancée and family. At times I would work 16 hours a day on top of my daily training and gym workout sessions.

I have constantly experienced muscle aches, fatigue and high stress situations in my work and when I’m competing. Since I was introduced to and started wearing FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant, I have felt and experienced a fantastic increase in my ability to concentrate on my competitive and business commitments.

Bowling is a sport that requires maintaining a high level of concentration for a long period (we compete for about 4 to 6 hours) of time, balance and stamina. After wearing the Quantum Pendant, I feel more energized, more alert and my stamina has improved tremendously. It has given me the winning edge over my opponents because I feel more calm, relaxed and confident when I compete and it has translated into an improvement in my performance. I even bowled a perfect game (300 games, 12 strikes in a row) with it after a week!

I would strongly recommend the Quantum Pendant to everyone; if it has helped me, imagine what it can do for you!
  Azidi Ameran, National Bowling Champion
- Credentials include Malaysian National Bowling Team Member for the last 11 years
- 2 time Malaysian National Sports Awards Team of the Year winner
- World Team Cup Champion
- Malaysian Open Champion
- Asian Champion
- National Champion
- Ranked 11th in the world in 2007.

Since retiring from full-time bowling, I am now coaching and running the “Pin Junction” Bowling Centre with Shalin. A bowling centre business involves really long hours; we open at 10am and close at 2am everyday, 365 days a year!

Since wearing FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant, I am able to cope with this hectic lifestyle and sometimes I’m even able to fit in a golf game or two in between and still carry on with my schedule.

The nagging pain of my old wrist injury from 17 years of competitive bowling has also stopped hurting.

Being a user and believer myself, I would definitely recommend the Quantum Pendant to everybody, especially if you love sports like I do.
  Malek Noor, KL (Champion Body Builder)
   
Sport Achievements: 
- 2 times Finalist Mr. Universe (Heavyweight) 
- 6 times Mr. Asia (Heavyweight) 
- 4 times Mr. Asean (Heavyweight) 
- 6 times Mr. Malaysia (Heavyweight) 

Special Awards: 
- Malaysian Sportsman of the Year - 1985 
- Gold Benson & Hedges Sports Personality Awards - 1985 
- Ahli Mangku Negara (AMN) Medal - 1986
- Sultan Ibrahim (PIS) Medal - 1986

"Quantum Pendant is nothing religious. It is given by God to heal you and for your health" - Malek Noor
I had a major operation done a few years ago to reconnect the tissue on my left arm. As a result I was having difficulty in clasping my left hand fingers.  However after putting on the FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant recently, amazingly I am able to clasp my left hand fingers with ease now. I also discovered that I am now able to walk immediately after standing up from the seat. Prior to this, I had to wait for few seconds before I could walk after getting up from the chair. I started having this problem as a result of the three operations done on my left knee and one on the right to fix my torn ligaments. Now I am happy to have found FusionExcel’s amazing Quantum Pendant. I also feel more focus & calm. Even food taste better.  The stiff elbow I use to have is now gone so are the headaches & colds I used to have as a result of sleeping late nights.  Toothache is no longer a problem. Best of all I feel more energetic and my sexual interest is enhanced.
 
I also operate a few gymnasiums. I tried the FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant on few people in the gym and they reported that it makes them lift the weights much easier. I also tried the FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant on a friend of mine who happens to be a sharp shooter in the police force and he reported that it made his arm more stable during firing practice and also it relieved him of stomach aches & toothaches. Others reported disappearing of numbness in their arm as well as increased in energy.
   Jean Daniels, International Golf Long Drive Specialist




 
My name is Jean Daniels. I am a South African but currently residing in Malaysia. I am an International Golf Long Drive Specialist. I have competed in the REMAX World Long Drive Tour for over 10 years. I have won 14 international long drive events. Hitting the golf ball over 400 yards regularly is a must in these events. I also run trick shot entertainment shows where I entertain golfers. In the shows I hit golf balls with many different strange equipments like: 

A rod made from rubber hose
A driver with a motor bike chain for a shaft
A driver with 2 hinges in the shaft
A hammer…. To name a few. 

I can also hit:
A golf ball with a putter over 200 yards
A golf ball with a 7 Iron over 200 yards
A golf ball up to 300 yards while on my knees
I can also hit a ball over, under, around and through many different objects.

In these trick shot shows I can’t afford to make any mistakes. For both long drive and the trick shows, BALANCE, FLEXIBILITY, MENTAL AWARENESS and STAMINA are very important factors which aids in maintaining consistency and the ability to perform the best. 

The problem is as I’m getting older, all of the important factors are getting more difficult to achieve. About a month ago I was introduced to FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant. At first I was very skeptical about the product and thought there must be some trick. After wearing the Quantum Pendant for about 2 weeks I started to realize the differences. Balance improvements were almost immediate even just practicing I could feel the difference. During golf shows, I made less mistakes and my stamina is better. Minor injuries like stiffness, joint pains and muscle pulls which happen all the time, heal faster.

The Quantum Pendant has definitely given me an added advantage to perform better. I really recommend the pendant to all golfers. Try it! It really works!
   Foo Kok Keong, International Badminton Champion
 
  • 1991 IBF Ranking World No. 1 Single Player
  • 1992 Champion Thomas Cup Team
  • 1994 Champion Asian Badminton Championship
For the past 5 years  I was having serious pain on my right knee cap due to many years of competitive sport including International Badminton Tournaments. After putting on the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant for just a few days, I begin to experience amazing relief of pain on my right knee cap. Recently, my stamina during sporting games had also IMPROVED TREMENDOUSLY due to the INCREASE OF ENERGY LEVEL provided by the Quantum Pendant. I highly recommend this Amazing Quantum Pendant to all who want to EXCEL in social & competitive sports.
 
   Pushfa Ramasamy, MBA in Sport Management (UK)

AWARDS/RECOGNITIONS

World Masters Athletes Championship

1995 - Buffalo, USA – ( 5TH Placing Javelin, 8th Placing Discuss)
1993 - Miazaki, Japan – ( 4th Placing Javelin)

Asian Masters Athletes Championship

2004 - Bronze Medalist ( Discus) , Bangkok, Thailand
2002 - Gold Medalist (Javelin) ahlian China 
           (Awarded Special Appreciation by MAVA Malaysia). 
2000 - Silver Medalist ( Javelin), Banglore, India
1994 - Silver Javelin, Jakarta
1992 - Gold Discuss,Singapore, 

International
Brunei Open Veteran Championship

2001 - 2 Gold, 1 Silver, 1 bronze (Javelin, Discuss, Shotput, 100m )
2000 - 3 Gold ( Javelin, Discuss, Shotput)

Testimonial:

I am amazed by the Quantum Pendant. My heart used to beat very fast with my fast moving pace, especially riding my BIG bike. Now I have more energy and strength to move forward.

Before I used to have a lot of pain in my neck and after using the pendant the pain is gone.
  I also always carry my Quantum Sports Flask with me and drinking the energized charged water has definitely increased my positive energy level and reduced my stress level. 

All ladies out there!!! Good news. Keep your body in shape. The Quantum Pendant not only reduces fat but also tightens and shapes your body. You can place the Amazing Quantum Pendant anywhere in your body for fast results.

USING is BELIEVING!!!
   Gary May, Donald Trump's Ex-Chef
 
A pendant? That can do miracles? Multi-level marketing? No no no no, I had enough… that was what our response was when a friend approached us. But you know what? It WORKS! My husband Gary May, a former chef for Donald Trump, has been a master chef for more than 15 years now. When he put on the Quantum Pendant for 2 days, his blood pressure went from 170/110 to 120/90, and it has been consistent until today. He used to change 4 or 5 T-shirts a day due to sweat, but now he only uses 1 or 2 T-shirts for the whole day. He doesn’t feel tired even when he goes up and down the staircase a few times at once. I think I am convinced, this Quantum Pendant works!
   Paul Lee, Owner of the Royal London Circus
 
The FusionExcel Quantum Pendant has positively changed both the lives of my wife & myself. In the business of the circus world, work is unusually stressful. I have experienced tremendous energy using the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant. Each day I normally can work only for a period up to half a day. Taking an afternoon nap to rest daily is a must for me otherwise it would be difficult to continue working till 6.00pm. Strangely enough, after putting on the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant, I became so energised that I could skip the afternoon nap & continue to work amazingly up to as late as 11.00pm or midnight.

Also climbing up staircases used to be a great challenge for me. I usually need to stop for air. Now this problem no longer exist after wearing the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant. This is a fantastic significant change for me. 

For the past 15 to 20 years, I had been so dependant on sleeping tablets. Without the sleeping tablets I just couldn't sleep (insomnia). After wearing the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant, amazingly I could now sleep soundly without taking any sleeping tablets at all.

On rainy days, I would usually get discomfort & pains on my joints. Now with the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant on me, the pains has totally disappeared. The FusionExcel Quantum Pendant is truly an amazing product, I recommend everybody to try it for themselves.
   Puan Sri Datin Rabitah Abdul Rashid
5 months ago, I suddenly suffered from terrible "frozen shoulder "on both sides. The pain and agony was concentrated more on my right side and also on both sides of my neck. I experienced sharp pain like pricking needles on my right shoulder my back ached especially when sleeping at night. It was very uncomfortable and inconvenient for me lifting and using my right hand doing simple household chores, like hanging clothes, cooking simple dishes like fried rice, and most of all eating, putting food into my mouth. I tried many ways to cure the pains. One of them was applying the Far Infrared Ray Heat treatment. 

2 months ago I was introduced to this wonderful Quantum Pendant at a private dinner by a family friend of ours, a lawyer and businessman. Instinct told me this Quantum Pendant is unique and wonderful and possibly could cure me of my ailment. A few days after the dinner on this auspicious date, 23rd April 2007, I wore the Quantum Pendant and immediately I felt it working it was getting rid of my toxins. So I continued to wear it day and night and drank plenty of scalar-charged water by the Quantum Pendant. Sure enough my frozen shoulders and my backaches disappeared completely after 3 days. I am still proudly wearing the Quantum Pendant and drinking plenty of scarla-charged water and feeling great! Thank you Fusion Excel for this wonderful Quantum Pendant and the marvellous Quantum Sports Flask which I brought over to my family in London for instant charging.
   Mdm Yap Lee Yong, 32 years old
Medical Problem: Gynecological problem – unable to conceive due to irregular and inadequate production of eggs. Eggs were also of low quality.

In 2001, after the doctor diagnosed my problem, he started me on 3 months of treatment to take medication in order to increase egg production. It was unsuccessful as there was no significant increase in egg production.

I then tried artificial insemination 3 times but that was also unsuccessful.

Finally, I decided to go through a test-tube pregnancy. I had a successful pregnancy only after the second attempt.

I went through 3 years of sadness, stress, disappointments and pain not to mention the high medical expense to get a child. Finally, my daughter Wong Shi Qi was born on November 29th 2004. She is going to be 3 years old soon.

The thought of going through another pregnancy was really frightening to me. I know I will have to go through another emotional, stressful ordeal not to mention the steep medical costs. I couldn’t decide in my mind if I would ever want to have another child.

I was very shocked when I conceived in May 2007 after wearing the pendant and drinking the energized water for about 3 months. I understood from my doctor if I ever wanted another child it would be through another test-tube. In fact, my eggs have been saved in the egg bank in SJMC.

I didn’t have to go through the same tiresome and stressful procedures to get pregnant this time. It was so natural! My husband is so happy about having another child and so relieved that this time there’s no need to visit the Doctor more than necessary and hardly the same kind of expenses as before.

We spent only RM563 each for both by husband and myself to get a Quantum Pendant. What we received is a wonderful gift which is priceless – the gift of a child!

Thank you FusionExcel!
 
   Low Kong Seong, Table Tennis National Player (1983) and Participant World Cup Japan (1983)
I was introduced to the Quantum Pendant by my good friend. At that time I was wearing magnetic bracelet and I was sceptical about the pendant. But to my surprise after wearing for two hours, I can feel increase in my energy and more alert. My friends also commented that I look much better and even my wrinkles have deminished. I found that I am calmer now and able to focus more clearly. I strongly recommend the Quantum Pendant to everyone!
 
 
   Edward Freeman
When I first introduced to Fusion Excel pendant, I was like most of the people, skeptical about the effects that were written about the product. But after listening to some real life testimonials from my associates, then I did some research over the internet. After watching some experiments conducted by Malik Noor on YouTube.com, I then visited the centre to test the experiment for myself. After the experiments I was totally amazed by its results which were as truthful as it is in the videos, thus l decided to purchase 5 units of Fusion Excel Quantum Pendants for all my family member & grandparents.

Being a full-time financial trader, the miracle Fusion Excel pendant had brought me more energy to focus on my trades as well as to make critical judgments more rapidly. The most amazing result is that I have fewer yawns & snooze through out the whole day as compared to before. Every time before I take my bath, I will put my pendant into the bath tub to “charge” the water, as the charged water molecule became energized thus my bath will be more refreshing than ever. I would also “charge” all my drinking water, as for the result I wouldn’t need to wake up to re-hydrate my throat during midnight because the water molecule are adsorb more readily & retained longer in the body. My conclusion is that Fusion Excel products are genuine & the benefits it will bring to the user is far more than anything stated in my testimonial, I’m truly thankful to Fusion Excel for the benefits of health it gave to my family.

Health has no price-tag; Fusion Excel is truly a great investment for your general well being.
 
   Ashley Choo, 32, Kuala Lumpur
I heard about QP from a friend ever since I got it has worked very well for me.
QP has given me energy; it has minimized my severe headaches due to being outdoors in the sun. QP has made me feel great, I am able to do much more than I could do. My days are longer because I have decided to use QP. Daily I wake up at 4.30am and most of my days end at 10pm , and occasionally even at 12.30am . I have no difficulty waking up the next day. I am really glad I discovered QP; I produce better results at work therefore resulting in more ideas and good feedback to solve problems. I have a clear mind, and I am glad QP has helped me to stay focused all through the day.

I am able to do much more strenuous work physically as well as mentally. I have also discovered that QP helps to adjust muscle spasm. Recently I had a sprained shoulder, resulting in me having pain even at the neck, QP helped to minimize the pain and now I do not have the problem anymore. The pain was only there for 2 days.

I also used to have constipation problem, now I no longer have this problem because QP has helped. I never used to be able to clear my bowels for more than 3 days, now QP has given me a 180 degree change now I clear my bowels twice a day. I feel much lighter in my abdomen.

I am really happy I discovered QP because it has help me to be more focused at work, I feel healthier, and I am able to fight the flu germs. I used to be always sick with the flu but now no longer, all I can say is I have a healthy mind and body. Thank you FusionExcel for the amazing Quantum Pendant!
 
   Nicholas Pua, 25 years old, Kuala Lumpur. (Golfer)
 
I am a full time golfer turning professional soon. I practice 8 hours daily. A friend of mine introduced the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant to me. After putting on the Quantum Pendant I find that it is able to help me to be more focused in my golf games. I feel more relax and more calm. Surprisingly I could even hit the golf ball to a further distance and with lesser effort. I also discovered that I am able to spend more time on my putting when I put on the Quantum Pendant. I no longer feel the backache which I normally do after 2 hours of putting. My flexibility have increased as well as the energy in my body as such I don’t feel that tired anymore after 8 hours of practise. It has also helped me to get good & sound sleep every night. With so many good & beneficial health features packed into one single product which ‘power’ I was told could last more than 100 years makes the Quantum Pendant truly an Amazing & Value for Money product. I’ve recommended it to all my friends. Thank you Fusion Excel for this wonderful product which I believe will bring much help & aid to many people by improving their health & lifestyle.
 
   Nicholas Pua, 25 years old, Kuala Lumpur. (Golfer)
 
A friend introduced the FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant to me. I was immediately impressed with the amazing demos. After putting on the Quantum Pendant, I discovered that my focus in golf games as well as at work was greatly enhanced. I was able to hit the golf ball to a further distance with the help of the Quantum Pendant and my swing and flexibility was amazingly improved.

I usually get knee joint pains after four and a half hours of golf game but after wearing the Quantum Pendant overnight, the pains disappear completely. Sometimes playing golf under hot sun gives me headache but thanks to the Quantum pendant, the headache disappears too.

The Quantum Pendant is truly an amazing product. It certainly improves a golfer's game with the additional bonus of removing all those aches that accompanies long hours of golf game at the same time. I highly promote the Quantum Pendant to all my golf customers. Thank you FusionExcel for such a fantastic product.
 
   Rena Chong, Social Golfer
I am a social golfer, however the past six months I've not played any game of golf due to busy work schedule. Recently, on 1st January, my friends invited me for a golf game. I was quite reluctant initially, giving the excuse that I've not played for sometime and therefore, may not be able to play well. However, just after playing a few strokes, my friends was surprised because I was able to achieve good shots. They asked me "how come?" Then I told them I have the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant in my pocket. I smiled and finally reveal to them the secret about the Quantum Pendant and its amazing powers.

My friend who was wearing a Magnetic Bracelet asked me to let her try the Quantum Pendant. She tried the Quantum Pendant and confessed "it really works!" She was able to hit the golf ball straight and further distance as a result of the Quantum Pendant.

In the month of February 2007, I went for a golf game in Kota Kinabalu, Sabah. Usually the furthest distance I could achieve was about 120 meter. That day I was able to achieve a distance of 180 meter. The caddie recommended that I hit the golf ball to the side to avoid the pond. However, I took the challenge and hit the ball straight over the pond. The caddie was surprised and remarked to me, "Puan, today you banyak bagus". I replied to him that it was not me but the amazing Quantum Pendant that provided the extra help.

I have an acute back ache problem for few years. I spent about RM 100 each month to buy medicinal plaster made in Taiwan to help relieve the pain. Now, after putting on the Quantum Pendant, my acute back ache is 95% gone! Also I can save RM 1200 yearly now as I no longer have to buy the medicinal plaster. I also use the Quantum Pendant to 'charge' the drinking water overnight. After drinking the 'charged' water, I could feel the 'winds' leaving my body.

Also I have migraine problem for 20 years. Recently, I had a relapse of migraine attack in September 2006. I usually get this attack every 3 to 4 months. After putting on the Quantum Pendant in November 2006, amazingly I've not have a single migraine attack for the past 4 months and my high blood pressure also have dropped.
 
   Rena Chong's Father-in-law
My 89 years old father-in-law has swollen feet and joint pain problem. One day I asked him to try the Quantum Pendant as it may help him. Usually he refuses to try any other health product that I buy for him. However, this time he tried the Quantum Pendant since he didn't have to consume anything. After 2 days, he still didn't return it to me, when I enquired what is his opinion about the Quantum Pendant. He said, “Can I keep it?” I smiled as he shared with me how the Quantum Pendant has relieved him of his joint pains and also reduce his swollen feet.

No words can express the joy it brings to see your own loved ones being relieved of their pains when they have suffered for so many years especially when it is within your power or ability to do so. Previously, not much could be done to help my father-in-law to ease his suffering. Now with the Quantum Pendant, this is possible.

Thank you FusionExcel for this wonderful product.
 
   Aubrey Swee Seet Peng, FitnessFirst Personal Trainer, Group Exercise Instructor
Amazing Pendant!!! My name is Aubrey Swee, I’m a FitnessFirst Personal Trainer and Group Exercise Instructor. I got to know this pendant from Jean Daniels. I like it because it has many benefits. I had a stiff neck due to an accident on 1st Jan 2007. I went on Parasailing with speedboat alone in Penang. I’d dropped into sea, being pulled in and out of the water by the speedboat. As a result, my wrist, elbow, left knee and the back of my neck was hurt. Subsequently, I’d visited the chiropractor and the physiotherapist a few times just to get rid of these soreness. However, the back of my neck still remain stiff. I’ve to do a lot of stretching just to keep it flexible and the soreness away. Miracle happened!!! Right after I started wearing the FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant for 2 weeks, this sore neck of mine started to disappear and now the sore is completely gone. Also, whenever I’m doing my personal training or class, I could do more weights with the exercise machine. This Quantum Pendant really helps me a lot. Because of this, I started to share its amazing benefits with my clients and to help them to improve their flexibility, energy or strength level. Thanks to FusionExcel for the amazing Quantum Pendant.
 
  Rachel Ngo, 32 years old, KL
In April 2006, I had a fall and fractured my left ankle. Due to this accident, I began to use my right leg more to move about. Not long after that I realized I began to suffer from severe pain on my right leg. I was unable to bend my knees. I used to dislike walking up and down the stairs. I had to walk up one step at a time.

My situation got worse, I began to seek for doctor’s advice. I was prescribed a capsule that would help to reduce my knee pain. I had to consume 2 tablets daily. Even after consuming the prescribed medicine, I could still feel numbness on the knees and the pain persisted.

One day I visited my friend. I shared with him my predicament. He immediately recommended me to try the Quantum Pendant. He tested the Quantum Pendant on me and I could immediately feel the effect in just 5 minutes. I felt there were some gushing types of movement in knees. And for the first time after so many months, I felt relieved.

Straight away I ordered the Quantum Pendant. Now after wearing the pendant for 1 week, my knees are feeling very much better. I no longer dread walking the stairs anymore. For a matter of fact, I’m even able to run up the stairs. I don’t have anymore crackling sound while I walk. The uncomfortable pain on my knees has reduced substantially. Thank God for my friend who showed me the Quantum Pendant.

Thank you FusionExcel for this marvellous product.
 
   Mali, KL
I was 49 years old when it finally dawned on me that the reason for my frequent knee pain, whenever I climbed stairs or go driving, is not only sign of old age, but a serious knee problem. I subsequently went to the doctor who prescribed glucosomine. That has been great for my knee except that I don't take it so often. I am not a great believer of taking western medication for fear of future side effect, especially on the kidney that was 5 years ago. So now, when my friend, Rena introduced me to Quantum Pendant, I signed up immediately, convinced that this is my miracle cure. I decided to stop taking the medication on the first day of wearing the pendant, just to test the effectiveness. Thank God, the pendant works for me and now, not only do I stopped the medication completely but also the pain is gone and driving long distance means continuous trip without having to do frequent stop. Thanks Rena for introducing me to FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant and thanks FusionExcel for the wonderful product.
 
   DATIN HJH CHE BARNI BT HJ MOHD NOOR, KL
I wish to share a personal experience about how the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant has helped to Change My Life.

In July 2006, while holidaying in Langkawi, I was struck with an unidentifiable sickness. From being able to walk, I was suddenly bedridden overnight. The pain was so excruciating that I cried every time I move even a tiny bit. I was transferred by ambulance to Alor Setar General Hospital and was hospitalized for two weeks. From the MRI they discovered there were damages to my Lumber 3,4 and 5 and as well as to my Sacrum 1.

Many doctors advised me to accept the worst, that I will be confined to a wheelchair. I refuse to accept that fate and began my therapy for about three months. Even then I still can't walk more than five steps without having to grap hold onto something for support. I cried with every walk because of the severe pain. Since the disease also affected my nervous system, my left leg could not function normally. My left leg get confusing signals that at times it felt pricking pains or numbness and at other times it gets severe pain. I could not sleep at night because my whole body was in pain.

I met someone in KL selling the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant. I was skeptical about the pendant initially but I have nothing to lose but to try anything. Strangely enough, as if it is a miracle, after continuously wearing the Quantum Pendant, the pain begins to subside especially on my left leg. I am able to get good night sleep again, something which I was deprived of for several months.

Recently I was even able to travel overseas to Cairo, Alexandria, Dubai and Abu Dhabi with ease. As a Muslim, I believe Allah will help me to find a cure as long as I never give up but to strive for a cure.

Now I am so thankful that I am able to get back my NORMAL LIFE again. Some of the doctors are even amazed & curious at my speedy recovery. My blood pressure is normal again and I feel energetic. I go to office as usual and DO NOT feel anymore pain in my leg especially when the air conditioner is on compare to the pain I get when the room is cold without wearing the Quantum Pendant. I believe the Quantum Pendant has contributed & assisted me much to get my Normal Life back again.

Thank you FusionExcel for the amazing Life Changing & Saving product!
 
   Joyce, KL, 45 years old
When I was first introduced to the FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant by my colleague, I was rather doubtful about the product. However, with several simple demonstrations, it impressed a lot. I decided to buy one for myself.

As I brought it home, I wore it on myself and I used it to energize the drinking water. My family thought it was a crazy act to spent such amount for the Quantum Pendant. They suggested I should buy gold pendant instead!

What a coincidence, my 10 year old son complaint of ear pain. I brought him to see doctor and he still complained about the pain after medication. He even cried whenever the ear medication prescribed by doctor was applied to his ear.

I decided to put on the Quantum Pendant around his neck and let him drink the energized water. On the following day, he told me that the ear pain has already disappeared. However, since it helped him to get rid the pain he kept on wearing it. Two days later he accidentally hit the Quantum Pendant to the basin. It cracked and broke into few pieces. The Quantum Pendant was glued back by my spouse without my knowledge.

The Quantum Pendant is truly an amazing product. Although it already broke (and glued back) I still treasure it.
